entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
